issue.title: LogicalType::FromThrift error on Centos 7 RPM
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7153](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7153). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When using FileMetaDataBuilder with a PrimitiveNode with converted type INT_64, we get the following exception message:

"Metadata contains Thrift LogicalType that is not recognized"

 

This happens when using the Centos 7 RPMs.

 

See attached Dockerfile which reproduces the bug.
